Sec. 8A-147. Schedule of charges—Display required.
It shall be unlawful for any person, firm, corporation or business establishment to make a charge for cashing checks, regardless of whether the charge be in the form of a required cash payment or a deduction from the proceeds of the check, without displaying, in a conspicuous place near the cashier, a sign printed in a plainly legible fashion setting forth the schedule of charges therefor.
